articles.title: Apple powers ahead in new renewable energy solutions with over 110 suppliers - Apple Newsroom
articles.description: Over 110 of Apple’s manufacturing partners around the world are moving to 100 percent renewable energy for their Apple production.

articles.title: S&P 500 breaks above 4,000 milestone as bull market barrels on - Mint
articles.description: The benchmark S&P 500 Index climbed past 4,000 for the first time as investors weighed President Joe Biden’s newly unveiled $2.25 trillion spending plan
